permissions.label: View Channels
permissions.description: Members with this permission can view text-based channels and receive events from them.

permissions.label: Modify Channels
permissions.description: Members with this permission can manage settings of channels, including changing the name, topic, icon, slowmode, NSFW status, and locking/unlocking.

permissions.label: Manage Channels
permissions.description: Members with this permission can manage channels, including creating, deleting, changing positions, moving between categories, and editing permission overwrites.

permissions.label: View Message History
permissions.description: Members with this permission can view the message history of text channels, even if they cannot send or receive new messages.

permissions.label: Send Messages
permissions.description: Members with this permission can send messages in text-based channels. The View Channels permission is required.

permissions.label: Manage Messages
permissions.description: Members with this permission can manage messages sent by others, including deleting, removing reactions, and unpublishing in announcement channels.

permissions.label: Attach Files
permissions.description: Members with this permission can attach files to messages in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Send Embeds
permissions.description: Members with this permission can send rich embeds or have embed links automatically appear in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Use External Emojis
permissions.description: Members with this permission can use emojis from other servers.

permissions.label: Add Reactions
permissions.description: Members with this permission can add new reactions to messages in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Pin Messages
permissions.description: Members with this permission can pin and unpin messages in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Star Messages
permissions.description: Members with this permission can star and unstar messages in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Publish Messages
permissions.description: Members with this permission can publish messages to the announcement channel feed.

permissions.label: Bulk Delete Messages
permissions.description: Members with this permission can delete or purge messages in bulk in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Privileged Mentions
permissions.description: Members with this permission can mention large groups of people, including everyone or non-mentionable roles, in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Manage Webhooks
permissions.description: Members with this permission can create, edit, and delete webhooks in text-based channels.

permissions.label: Connect
permissions.description: Members with this permission can connect to voice channels.

permissions.label: Speak
permissions.description: Members with this permission can speak in voice channels.

permissions.label: Mute Members
permissions.description: Members with this permission can mute other members in voice channels.

permissions.label: Deafen Members
permissions.description: Members with this permission can deafen other members in voice channels.

permissions.label: Change Nickname
permissions.description: Members with this permission can change their own nickname on the server.

permissions.label: Manage Nicknames
permissions.description: Members with this permission can change the nicknames of other members on the server.

permissions.label: Manage Emojis
permissions.description: Members with this permission can create, edit, and delete emojis for the server.

permissions.label: Manage Starboard
permissions.description: Members with this permission can delete starboard posts or disable the starboard for the server.

permissions.label: Manage Server
permissions.description: Members with this permission can manage the server's settings, including changing the name, icon, visibility, and enabling/disabling the starboard.

permissions.label: Manage Roles
permissions.description: Members with this permission can manage the server's roles, edit permissions of lower roles, and assign/remove roles from other members.

permissions.label: Create Invites
permissions.description: Members with this permission can create invites to the server.

permissions.label: Manage Invites
permissions.description: Members with this permission can revoke or pause invites of any channel in the server.

permissions.label: Timeout Members
permissions.description: Members with this permission can timeout and untimeout members with a lower role than them.

permissions.label: Kick Members
permissions.description: Members with this permission can kick members with a lower role than them from the server.

permissions.label: Ban Members
permissions.description: Members with this permission can ban and unban members with a lower role than them from the server.

permissions.label: View Audit Log
permissions.description: Members with this permission can view an audit log of past moderation or other privileged actions on the server.

permissions.label: Administrator
permissions.description: Members with this permission have the ability to override all permissions and any channel on the server.
